Take Your Canva Graphics Design Skills to New Heights with Our Comprehensive Course Led By Experts and Gain Competitive Advantage in the Market-place

Our Canva design course is created to give you an in-depth understanding of the principles, practices and techniques involved in creating and managing impactful visual designs. Whether you are a business owner aiming to establish a strong brand identity or an entrepreneur seeking to launch a successful design-based venture, this course equips you with the necessary skills you need to excel in this exciting field.

Sign Up Now To Get A 20% Discount

Canva Graphics Design

Our course is tailored specifically for beginners and provides a practical approach to learning with real-world case studies, interactive exercises, and feedback from industry professionals. By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in your design-based endeavours.

Program Overview

The Canva Design course provides learners with an understanding of the graphics design industry, emphasizing essential strategies and tools for creating visually stunning and professional designs using Canva. This program covers a wide range of topics, including design principles, typography, color theory, image editing, branding, social media graphics, and print design. By gaining a well-rounded knowledge base, participants will acquire the skills necessary to excel in the field of graphics design using Canva’s versatile and user-friendly interface.

  • Basic Design Principles

  • Color Theory

  • Social Media Design

  • Image Editing

  • Design Elements

  • Logo Design

  • Visual Branding

  • Creating Presentations

  • Typography

Life As A Graphics Design Professional

Graphic design is a dynamic and exciting field that requires creativity, problem-solving skills, and continuous learning. As professionals in this field, graphic designers thrive in a creative environment where they constantly seek inspiration from their surroundings and explore art, photography, typography, and design trends to fuel their imagination and generate innovative ideas for their projects.

Collaboration plays a significant role in the work of graphic designers. They often work with clients or stakeholders to understand their vision and goals and combine their artistic vision with the client’s requirements, brand guidelines, and target audience preferences. Graphic designers pay meticulous attention to detail and ensure that every element of their design, from typography and color choices to spacing and alignment, is polished and aligned with the project’s objectives.

Graphic designers have the opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects, such as branding and identity design, marketing materials, website design, social media graphics, packaging, and more. This variety keeps their work engaging and allows them to continually explore new design techniques and challenges. With each project, graphic designers are presented with new opportunities to learn and grow, whether by experimenting with new design approaches or incorporating emerging technologies into their work.

Finally, graphic designers find fulfillment in seeing their designs make a positive impact. Whether it’s creating a memorable brand identity, designing user-friendly interfaces, or crafting compelling visual narratives, they take pride in knowing that their work has the potential to influence and engage audiences. To stay current in their profession, graphic designers are lifelong learners, staying updated on the latest design trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices through self-guided learning, workshops, courses, and industry events. Through continuous learning and creative exploration, graphic designers are always seeking to enhance their design abilities and make a meaningful impact through their work.

Career Advantages

Growing demand

The demand for Canva design professionals is on the rise. In today's visual-driven world, businesses, entrepreneurs, and content creators rely heavily on captivating visual content to engage their audience. As a Canva graphics design professional, you'll be in high demand, with a multitude of job opportunities available across industries and sectors.

High Earn Potential

With the increasing demand for visually appealing and professional graphics, Canva design professionals often enjoy competitive salaries. Your ability to create stunning designs using Canva's intuitive platform will make you a sought-after asset to companies and clients. This translates into attractive compensation packages and financial stability in your career.

Versatility Skill Set

Canva design professionals possess a versatile skill set that extends beyond graphic design. In addition to mastering Canva's features and tools, you'll develop expertise in areas such as branding, social media marketing and management, and visual content creation. These skills make you a well-rounded professional capable of tackling diverse design projects and exploring various career paths within the creative industry.

Entrepreneurial Opportunities

If you aspire to be your own boss or work independently, the Canva design field offers entrepreneurial opportunities. Armed with your Canva skills, you can establish your own design agency, offer freelance design services, or create and sell digital products such as templates and designs. This level of independence and flexibility allows you to shape your own career and pursue your entrepreneurial ambitions.

Creative Freedom

As a Canva graphics design professional, you'll enjoy the creative freedom to bring your imaginative ideas to life. Canva's extensive library of design elements, templates, and customizable features empowers you to create visually stunning and personalized designs. You'll have the opportunity to unleash your creativity, experiment with different styles, and produce captivating graphics that leave a lasting impact on your clients and their audiences.

What career will this programme prepare me for?

  • Graphic designer

  • Social media manager

  • Content Creator

  • E-Commerce store designer

  • UI/UX Designer

  • Branding Specialist

There are extra advantages of taking the Canva graphic design Course at our institution. You will acquire the skills required for professional success, thanks to our knowledgeable instructors and hands-on learning style as well as the support we offer you every step of the way. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner, our curriculum is designed to cater to your needs. Plus, you’ll gain access to abundant resources and be a part of a vibrant community of learners and professionals. With all these resources and support, you’ ll be well on your way to becoming a thriving Canva graphics designer.

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Physical and Virtual Classes

You will participate in physical and live virtual classes that will provide a platform for discussions, question-and-answer sessions, and feedback. The classes are designed to be interactive, with students encouraged to ask questions and participate in group discussions.

Case Studies

You'll get to dive into real-life examples and case studies from the world of graphic design. This will give you some valuable insights and hands-on experience that you can use in your own work.

Projects

Get ready to roll up your sleeves and put your design skills into practice! In this course, you'll work on projects that allow you to apply the concepts you've learned. You'll get to create and enhance various designs, with guidance and feedback from industry experts. By going through this process, you'll gain the confidence and skills you need to succeed in the exciting field of graphics design.

Interactive Quizzes

The program includes interactive quizzes that will test your understanding of the concepts and tools covered in each module. The quizzes are designed to be engaging and will provide instant feedback on the student's performance.

What You Will Learn

Welcome to the exciting world of Canva graphics design! Our course is thoughtfully designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in this  ever-evolving field. With 5 engaging modules, you’ll go through a transformative learning experience, exploring different aspects of Canva graphics design and gaining the expertise to create, manage, and grow successful visual endeavours.

 

Here is what you will learn:

  • Module 1
  • Module 2
  • Module 3
  • Module 4
  • Module 5

  • Access to a stable internet connection

  • Proficiency in written and spoken English

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
